    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • pyxmpp2.test.sasl__gsasl.GSASLError
        • pyxmpp2.test.sasl__gsasl.OurSASLError
        • exceptions.StandardError: Base class for all standard Python exceptions that do not represent interpreter exiting.
          • exceptions.AssertionError: Assertion failed.
          • pyxmpp2.exceptions.Error: Base class for all PyXMPP exceptions.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ClientError: Raised on a client error.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FatalClientError: Raised on a fatal client error.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.JIDError: Exception raised when invalid JID is used
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.JIDMalformedProtocolError: Raised when invalid JID is encountered.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.NoRouteError: Raised when a stanza cannot be routed internally.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ProtocolError: Raised when there is something wrong with a stanza processed.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.BadRequestProtocolError: Raised when invalid stanza is processed and 'bad-request' error should be reported.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FeatureNotImplementedProtocolError: Raised when stanza requests a feature which is not (yet) implemented.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.JIDMalformedProtocolError: Raised when invalid JID is encountered.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.NotAcceptableProtocolError: Raised when invalid stanza is processed and 'not-acceptable' error should be reported.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ResourceConstraintProtocolError: Raised when stanza requests a feature which is not (yet) implemented.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ServiceUnavailableProtocolError: Raised when stanza requests a feature which is not (yet) implemented.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.PyXMPPIOError: Exception raised on I/O error.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.StreamError: Base class for all stream errors.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ClientStreamError: Raised on a client stream error.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.LegacyAuthenticationError: Raised on a legacy authentication error.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.RegistrationError: Raised on a in-band registration error.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.ComponentStreamError: Raised on a component error.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FatalComponentStreamError: Raised on a fatal component error.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FatalStreamError: Base class for all fatal Stream exceptions.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.DNSError: Raised when no host name could be resolved for the target.
                  • pyxmpp2.exceptions.UnexpectedCNAMEError: Raised when CNAME record was found when A or AAAA was expected.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FatalClientStreamError: Raised on a fatal client stream error.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.FatalComponentStreamError: Raised on a fatal component error.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.StreamAuthenticationError: Raised when stream authentication fails.
                  • pyxmpp2.exceptions.SASLAuthenticationFailed: Raised when stream SASL authentication fails.
                  • pyxmpp2.exceptions.SASLMechanismNotAvailable: Raised when none of SASL authentication mechanisms requested is available.
                  • pyxmpp2.exceptions.SASLNotAvailable: Raised when SASL authentication is requested, but not available.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.StreamParseError: Raised when invalid XML is received in an XMPP stream.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.TLSError: Raised on TLS error during stream processing.
                • pyxmpp2.exceptions.TLSNegotiationFailed: Raised when stream TLS negotiation fails.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.HostMismatch: Exception raised when the connected host name is other then requested.
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.StreamEncryptionRequired: Exception raised when stream encryption is requested, but not used.
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.StringprepError: Exception raised when string preparation results in error.
          • exceptions.ValueError: Inappropriate argument value (of correct type).
            • pyxmpp2.exceptions.JIDError: Exception raised when invalid JID is used
              • pyxmpp2.exceptions.JIDMalformedProtocolError: Raised when invalid JID is encountered.

    • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.ClientAuthenticator: Base class for client authenticators.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.digest_md5.DigestMD5ClientAuthenticator: Provides DIGEST-MD5 SASL authentication for a client.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.external.ExternalClientAuthenticator: Provides client-side External SASL (TLS-Identify) authentication.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.plain.PlainClientAuthenticator: Provides PLAIN SASL authentication for a client.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAMClientAuthenticator: Provides SCRAM SASL authentication for a client.

      • pyxmpp2.sasl.xfacebookplatform.XFacebookPlatformClientAuthenticator: Provides client-side XFacebookPlatform authentication.

    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.Event: Base class for PyXMPP2 events.
      • pyxmpp2.test.resolver.DummyEvent
      • pyxmpp2.streamevents.StreamEvent: Base class for all stream events.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.AuthenticatedEvent: Event raised after stream authentication is complete.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.AuthorizedEvent: Event raised after stream authentication and authorization is complete.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.BindingResourceEvent: Emitted when resource binding is initiated for the stream.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.ConnectedEvent: Emitted after the stream socket is connected, just before the actual XMPP exchange happens.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.ConnectingEvent: Emitted on TCP connection attempt.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.ConnectionAcceptedEvent: Emitted when a new TCP connection is accepted.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.DisconnectedEvent: Emitted when the stream is disconnected.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.GotFeaturesEvent: Emitted when the stream features are received.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.ResolvingAddressEvent: Emitted when staring to resolve an address (A or AAAA) DNS record for a hostname.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.ResolvingSRVEvent: Emitted when staring to resolve an SRV DNS record for a domain.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.StreamConnectedEvent: Emitted when the initial stream handshake (<stream:stream> tag exchange) is completed, before any authentication.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.StreamRestartedEvent: Emitted after stream is restarted (<stream:stream> tag exchange) e.g.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.TLSConnectedEvent: Emitted when the TLS layer has been established.
        • pyxmpp2.streamevents.TLSConnectingEvent: Emitted when the TLS handshake starts.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.events.EventDispatcher: Dispatches events from an event queue to event handlers.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.threads.EventDispatcherThread: Event dispatcher thread.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.EventHandler: Base class for PyXMPP event handlers.
      • pyxmpp2.client.Client: Base class for an XMPP-IM client.
      • pyxmpp2.test._util.EventRecorder: An event handler which records all events received and aborts the main loop on the DisconnectedEvent.
        • pyxmpp2.test.streambase.AuthorizedEventHandler

      • pyxmpp2.simple.FireAndForget: A minimal XMPP client that just connects to a server and runs single function.
      • pyxmpp2.session.SessionHandler: RFC 3921 session establishment implementation.
      • pyxmpp2.streamtls.StreamTLSHandler: Handler for stream TLS support.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.IOHandler: Wrapper for a socket or a file descriptor to be used in event loop or for I/O threads.
      • pyxmpp2.server.listener.TCPListener: Listens on a TCPSocket calling a function on incoming connection.
      • pyxmpp2.transport.TCPTransport: XMPP over TCP with optional TLS.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.IOHandlerPrepareResult: Result of the IOHandler.prepare method.
      • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.HandlerReady: Returned by the IOHandler.prepare method when the object is ready to handle I/O events and doesn't need further calls to the IOHandler.prepare method.
      • pyxmpp2.mainloop.interfaces.PrepareAgain: Returned by the IOHandler.prepare method when the method needs to be called again.
    • pyxmpp2.mainloop.threads.IOThread: Base class for ReadingThread and WrittingThread.
      • pyxmpp2.mainloop.threads.ReadingThread: A thread reading from io_handler.
      • pyxmpp2.mainloop.threads.WrittingThread: A thread reading from io_handler.

        • pyxmpp2.mainloop.select.SelectMainLoop: Main event loop implementation based on the select.select() call.
      • pyxmpp2.mainloop.threads.ThreadPool: Thread pool object, as a replacement for an asychronous event loop.

    • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.Reply: Base class for SASL authentication reply objects.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.Challenge: The challenge SASL message (server's challenge for the client).
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.Failure: The failure SASL message.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.Response: The response SASL message (clients's reply the server's challenge).
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.Success: The success SASL message (sent by the server on authentication success).
    • pyxmpp2.interfaces.Resolver: Abstract base class for asynchronous DNS resolvers to be used with PyxMPP.
      • pyxmpp2.resolver.BlockingResolver: Blocking resolver using the DNSPython package.
      • pyxmpp2.resolver.DumbBlockingResolver: Simple blocking resolver using only the standard Python library.
      • pyxmpp2.resolver.ThreadedResolverBase: Base class for threaded resolvers.
        • pyxmpp2.resolver.ThreadedResolver: Threaded resolver implementation using the DNSPython dns.resolver module.
    • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAMOperations: Functions used during SCRAM authentication and defined in the RFC.
      • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAMClientAuthenticator: Provides SCRAM SASL authentication for a client.

      • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAMServerAuthenticator: Provides SCRAM SASL authentication for a server.
        • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAM_SHA_1_PLUS_ServerAuthenticator: The SCRAM-SHA-1-PLUS server authenticator.
        • pyxmpp2.sasl.scram.SCRAM_SHA_1_ServerAuthenticator: The SCRAM-SHA-1 server authenticator.
    • pyxmpp2.sasl.core.ServerAuthenticator: Base class for server authenticators.

    • pyxmpp2.settings._SettingDefinition: A PyXMPP2 setting meta-data and defaults.
    • dict: dict() -> new empty dictionary dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's (key, value) pairs dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via: d = {} for k, v in iterable: d[k] = v dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs in the keyword argument list.
      • pyxmpp2.expdict.ExpiringDictionary: An extension to standard Python dictionary objects which implements item expiration.
    • type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
      • abc.ABCMeta: Metaclass for defining Abstract Base Classes (ABCs).
